item.title: Farewell and New Beginning
item.description:
From March 2017 to September 2025, I have been part of the GNSS Laboratory at Seoul National University, completing my graduate studies and concluding my journey as a postdoctoral researcher.

I am deeply grateful to Prof. Changdon Kee, whose pioneering Ph.D. work on Wide-Area DGPS (WADGPS) laid the groundwork for what became todayâ€™s Satellite-Based Augmentation Systems (SBAS). His invaluable guidance has shaped my growth as a researcher, and I also extend my sincere thanks to all my colleagues for their companionship and support throughout these years.

In particular, I wish for the successful launch of SNUGLITE-III CubeSat scheduled on November 27, 2025. ðŸš€

This October, I begin my new chapter as a Postdoctoral Researcher in Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering at the University of Liverpool, joining Dr Stefania Soldiniâ€™s research group. My research will focus on Guidance, Navigation, and Control (GNC) for asteroid missions under the #REMORA project.

I look forward to this new stage of life, and I hope to continue building meaningful collaborations at future conferences and beyond.
